title: Men's Solid White Slim Fit T-shirt
description:
Switch up your everyday wardrobe with this trending t-shirt from Levi's. Ideal to wear for all seasons, this versatile t-shirt features a crew neck and half sleeves. Comfortable essential with a solid pattern.

1. A slim fit in the shade white and cotton fabric
2. Style it with our 512 jeans and sneakers to complete your outfit.
